This week on Dropout...

Tuesday

Dimension 20 Animated!

1:30pm ET / 10:30am PT

At the Battle of the Brands, Sundry Sidney enacts a devious plan. Animated by Trevor Dedekind and Alex Dron.

 ‚ûî

Wednesday

Dimension 20: Gladlands

7pm ET / 4pm PT

The Carer Van arrives to the overworked town of Rotglob, but stress and potential sabotage awaits.

 ‚ûî

Thursday

Adventuring Party

1:30pm ET / 10:30am PT

The cast chats about sweetie stuff, the clock system, and Coldplay.

 ‚ûî

Very Important People

7pm ET / 4pm PT

Vic interviews legendary entertainer Fanoli (Angela Giarratana) and gets a new theme song.

 ‚ûî

Friday

Very Important People: Last Looks

1:30pm ET / 10:30am PT

The crew of Very Important People discusses how Angela Giarratana became Fanoli.

 ‚ûî
